snippet.title: ARMA II: OPERATION ARROWHEAD - Official Trailer HD (PC)
snippet.description:
Meridian4 has secured the North American retail publishing rights to Bohemia Interactives new stand-alone, expansion pack, ArmA II: Operation Arrowhead.

Meridian4 is also planning on introducing ARMA II Combined Operations, a  special edition bundle that consists of the original award winning ArmA II game and Operation Arrowhead.  Both offerings are schedule to hit retailers across North America on June 29.

Check out my channel for more trailers and videos for upcoming games, and also be sure to check out our site: http://Feckis.com for all the latest gaming news, as well as for reviews!
